Entry.en-US: An unexpected opportunity presents itself with the arrival of a small band of fierce looking {TRIBE-3,1} warriors at the gates of {CITY-2}. While there are some initial delays due to the language barrier, once that gets worked out, the leader of the group informs you that the {TRIBE-3} are impressed with you and yours, and as you are relative newcomers to the region who have treated them fairly thus far, they would like to talk about trading opportunities, depending on your most pressing needs. How do you wish to respond to their offer?
Entry.it-IT: Un'opportunità inaspettata si presenta con l'arrivo di un piccolo gruppo di guerrieri {TRIBE-3,1} dall'aspetto feroce alle porte di {CITY-2}. Sebbene ci siano alcuni ritardi iniziali dovuti alla barriera linguistica, una volta risolta la questione, il capo del gruppo vi informa che i {TRIBE-3} sono impressionati da voi e dai vostri e che, poiché siete dei relativi nuovi arrivati nella regione che finora li hanno trattati in modo equo, vorrebbero parlare di opportunità di scambio, a seconda delle vostre necessità più urgenti. Come volete rispondere alla loro offerta?

Entry.en-US: A large group of {TRIBE-2,1} pilgrims arrives in your Court seeking an audience. Their leader bows before your throne. "We have come to pay our respects to our brothers and sisters of the faith, and offer what talents we have to your Court. We are at your service. What would you ask of the {TRIBE-2}?"
Entry.it-IT: Un folto gruppo di pellegrini {TRIBE-2,1} arriva alla tua Corte in cerca di udienza. Il loro capo si inchina davanti al vostro trono. "Siamo venuti a rendere omaggio ai nostri fratelli e sorelle di fede e a offrire i nostri talenti alla vostra Corte. Siamo al vostro servizio. Cosa volete chiedere al {TRIBE-2}?".

Entry.en-US: You and {CHARACTER-2} have fallen into an easy friendship thanks to your similar, affable natures. The two of you are often found in each other's company, riding, visiting one another's lands, and talking about ways to help improve the lives of your two Peoples. In a world fraught with violence and peril, this bodes well indeed, and presents a unique opportunity. How will you leverage this budding friendship?
Entry.it-IT: Tra te e {CHARACTER-2} si è instaurata una facile amicizia grazie alla vostra natura simile e affabile. Vi trovate spesso in compagnia l'uno dell'altro, a cavalcare, a visitare le terre dell'altro e a parlare di come contribuire a migliorare la vita dei vostri due popoli. In un mondo pieno di violenza e di pericoli, questo è di buon auspicio e rappresenta un'opportunità unica. Come sfrutterete questa nascente amicizia?

Entry.en-US: Your policy of allowing child labor in {CITY-0} has put you at odds with the {TRIBE-4}. Over time, an increasing number of their children have been arrested for petty crimes and sentenced to hard labor. The situation has slowly increased tensions and has now reached a boiling point, with {CHARACTER-4} appearing in your Court and demanding an end to the practice. How shall we respond?
Entry.it-IT: La vostra politica di permettere il lavoro minorile in {CITY-0} vi ha messo in contrasto con i {TRIBE-4}. Nel corso del tempo, un numero crescente di loro figli è stato arrestato per reati minori e condannato ai lavori forzati. La situazione ha lentamente aumentato le tensioni e ora ha raggiunto il punto di ebollizione, con i {CHARACTER-4} che si sono presentati alla vostra Corte per chiedere la fine di questa pratica. Come dobbiamo rispondere?

Entry.en-US: You and {CHARACTER-SHORT-4} have a shared love of all that glitters, so it is no great surprise to you when the leader of the {TRIBE-4} approaches you with an intriguing proposition. A shipment of goods belonging to {PLAYER-5} will be traveling through lands near {TRIBE-4,1} territory. If you could see your way to help fund an operation, {TRIBE-4,1} raiders will hit the merchants and the two of you can split the proceeds. Interested?
Entry.it-IT: Voi e il {CHARACTER-SHORT-4} avete in comune l'amore per tutto ciò che luccica, quindi non vi sorprende molto quando il capo del {TRIBE-4} vi avvicina con una proposta intrigante. Un carico di merci appartenenti a {PLAYER-5} attraverserà le terre vicine al territorio di {TRIBE-4,1}. Se riuscite a trovare il modo di contribuire a finanziare un'operazione, i razziatori di {TRIBE-4,1} colpiranno i mercanti e voi due potrete dividere i proventi. Siete interessati?

Entry.en-US: You've gained a new respect for {CHARACTER-3}. Of late, you have been comparing notes about how unfairly both of you have been treated in this life, and your shared bitterness has blossomed into a somewhat begrudging friendship. Even though, deep down you actually kind of hate {G3:him:her}, at least you understand {G3:him:her}, and that's worth something. {G3:He's:She's} coming to Court next week for a scheduled visit. How shall the two of you spend your time?
Entry.it-IT: Avete acquisito un nuovo rispetto per {CHARACTER-3}. Negli ultimi tempi vi siete confrontati su quanto entrambi siete stati trattati ingiustamente in questa vita e la vostra comune amarezza è sbocciata in un'amicizia un po' rancorosa. Anche se nel profondo odiate {G3:him:her}, almeno capite {G3:him:her}, e questo vale qualcosa. {G3:He's:She's} verrà a Corte la prossima settimana per una visita programmata. Come trascorrerete il tempo?

Entry.en-US: You and {CHARACTER-4} have spent quite a lot of time together lately, conducting joint operations to train your troops and {G4:his:her} tribal warriors. Both of you are particularly adept at laying siege to fortified positions and the practice has been paying off for both of you. Just now {CHARACTER-SHORT-4} arrives grinning at your court. "I have a surprise for you." {G4:He:She} says simply, beckoning you off your throne to investigate. Arriving in the courtyard, the sight of the war machine takes your breath away. "I call it a 'Field Ass'" {G4:He:She} says proudly. "A gift."
Entry.it-IT: Voi e {CHARACTER-4} avete trascorso molto tempo insieme ultimamente, conducendo operazioni congiunte per addestrare le vostre truppe e i guerrieri tribali di {G4:his:her}. Entrambi siete particolarmente abili nell'assediare posizioni fortificate e la pratica ha dato i suoi frutti. Proprio ora {CHARACTER-SHORT-4} arriva sorridente alla vostra corte.

Entry.en-US: In recent months, you and {CHARACTER-3} have become something of brothers in arms, often riding out on hunts together, training your troops with {TRIBE-3,1} War Bands, and of course, drinking and feasting together. There's something calming about being in the presence of bold, likeminded men and women. It makes you feel as though you can accomplish most anything. You and {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} have outlined a number of possible initiatives you could pursue jointly, and now seems like as good a time as any to sieze upon one and run with it. Fortune, after all, does favor the bold. What should the two of you focus on?
Entry.it-IT: Negli ultimi mesi, tu e {CHARACTER-3} siete diventati una sorta di fratelli d'armi, spesso andando a caccia insieme, addestrando le tue truppe con le Bande da Guerra di {TRIBE-3,1} e, naturalmente, bevendo e banchettando insieme. e, naturalmente, bevendo e banchettando insieme. C'è qualcosa di rassicurante nell'essere in presenza di uomini e donne audaci e dalla mentalità simile. Ti fa sentire come se potessi realizzare quasi tutto. Voi e {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} avete delineato una serie di possibili iniziative che potreste portare avanti insieme, e questo sembra un momento come un altro per prenderne una e portarla avanti. La fortuna, dopo tutto, favorisce gli audaci. Su cosa dovreste concentrarvi voi due?

Entry.en-US: You and {CHARACTER-3} have been spending increasing amounts of time in the Blood Pits of {CITY-4}. A crude arena built by the commoners of that city where anyone can pay to fight. The competition is always fierce and the battles bloody, but both you and {CHARACTER-3} have won honor and glory. Although you are the better warrior overall, {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} is no slouch, and {G3:he:she} has gotten the better of you a few times. There's another match coming up. If you push yourself, victory is a foregone conclusion. What's your plan?
Entry.it-IT: Tu e {CHARACTER-3} avete trascorso sempre più tempo nelle fosse di sangue di {CITY-4}. Una rozza arena costruita dai popolani di quella città dove chiunque può pagare per combattere. La competizione è sempre feroce e le battaglie sanguinose, ma sia tu che {CHARACTER-3} avete conquistato onore e gloria. Sebbene tu sia il guerriero migliore in assoluto, {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} non è da meno e {G3:he:she} ha avuto la meglio su di te alcune volte. C'è un'altra partita in arrivo. Se ti sforzi, la vittoria è scontata. Qual è il tuo piano?

Entry.en-US: Tensions have been running high in your Realm of late, with battles swirling around the whole of the region. Thus, it is perhaps no great surprise when {CHARACTER-2} rides to your Court, seeking an audience. "As you are no doubt aware," {G2: he:she} begins, "We are currently giving battle to {PLAYER-3}. Our war does not go well, but you could help change that." The full meaning of {G2:his:her} words hang heavy on the air. How do you respond?
Entry.it-IT: La tensione nel vostro Reame è stata alta negli ultimi tempi, con battaglie che hanno coinvolto l'intera regione. Pertanto, non è forse una grande sorpresa quando {CHARACTER-2} si reca alla vostra Corte, chiedendo udienza. "Come sicuramente saprete", esordisce {G2: he:she}, "attualmente stiamo combattendo contro {PLAYER-3}. La nostra guerra non va bene, ma voi potreste aiutarci a cambiare le cose". Il pieno significato delle parole di {G2:his:her} è sospeso nell'aria. Come rispondete?

Entry.en-US: You and {CHARACTER-3} are both like-minded leaders, and both of the opinion that the true measure of greatness of your respective realms lies not in how many troops you command, but in how the least members of your People are treated. The Harvest Festival has always been a time of celebration and thanksgiving, but not everyone gets to enjoy it. Recently, you were inspired by a conversation you had with {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} to expand the scope of the Festival to make it more accessible to everyone, including the large and growing population of orphaned children in your Realm. It would be expensive, but the benefits could be far reaching indeed, especially if you could find the resources to open the festival to the {TRIBE-3} as well. How do you wish to proceed?
Entry.it-IT: Tu e {CHARACTER-3} siete entrambi leader dalla mentalità affine ed entrambi siete dell'opinione che la vera misura della grandezza dei vostri rispettivi regni non risieda nel numero di truppe che comandate, ma nel modo in cui vengono trattati gli ultimi membri del vostro Popolo. La Festa del Raccolto è sempre stata un momento di festa e di ringraziamento, ma non tutti possono goderne. Di recente, in seguito a una conversazione avuta con {CHARACTER-SHORT-3}, siete stati ispirati ad ampliare la portata della Festa per renderla più accessibile a tutti, compresa la grande e crescente popolazione di bambini orfani del vostro Reame. Sarebbe costoso, ma i benefici potrebbero essere davvero di vasta portata, soprattutto se riusciste a trovare le risorse per aprire il Festival anche ai {TRIBE-3}. Come desidera procedere?

Entry.en-US: Long have you respected {CHARACTER-3} for {G3:his:her} selflessness and bravery. {G3:He:She} is a talented leader, and you've made no secret of your admiration and respect. Recently, {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} once more proved to be worthy of that admiration and respect. A report has reached your ears that more than a dozen of your citizens were set upon by a pack of wolves. Many would have been killed, if not for the sudden appearance of {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} in thier midst. Unasked and unafraid, {G3:he:she} defended your People, singlehandedly holding the wolves at bay until they could make their escape. The news fills you with a great swell of pride, even as you recognize it as a political opportunity. How do you wish to respond to this incredible act of bravery?
Entry.it-IT: Da tempo rispettate {CHARACTER-3} per l'altruismo e il coraggio di {G3:his:her}. {G3:Lui:Lei} è un leader di talento e non avete fatto mistero della vostra ammirazione e del vostro rispetto. Recentemente, {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} ha dimostrato ancora una volta di essere degno di tale ammirazione e rispetto. È giunta alle vostre orecchie la notizia che più di una dozzina di vostri cittadini sono stati attaccati da un branco di lupi. Molti sarebbero stati uccisi, se non fosse stato per l'improvvisa apparizione di {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} in mezzo a loro. Senza chiedere e senza paura, {G3:he:she} ha difeso il vostro popolo, tenendo a bada da solo i lupi finché non sono riusciti a fuggire. La notizia vi riempie di un grande orgoglio, anche se la riconoscete come un'opportunità politica. Come volete rispondere a questo incredibile atto di coraggio?

Entry.en-US: You spend a lot of time thinking of new and creative ways to torture people. It's a hobby of yours and a thing you have in common with {CHARACTER-3}. In fact, the two of you have come up with so many conjectural devices, you'd be hard pressed to select a favorite. Would it be the "Lama Drama" machine that slowly pulls subjects apart? Covering a hapless victim in honey and feed, then letting a score of ravenous chickens loose to work their magic, or perhaps that odd looking contraption {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} sketched out called the "Pulley-Driven Prisoner Dicer and Maligner?" Either way, it occurs to you that it might be fun to have your engineers actually build them and put them on display as a means of keeping the annoying heads of your vassal families in line. It would be expensive, to be sure, but it could be fun, or at least "fun," and there's value in that too. What do you want to do?
Entry.it-IT: Passate molto tempo a pensare a modi nuovi e creativi per torturare le persone. È un tuo hobby e una cosa che hai in comune con {CHARACTER-3}. In effetti, voi due avete ideato così tanti dispositivi congetturali che sarebbe difficile scegliere il preferito. Sarebbe forse la macchina "Lama Drama", che fa lentamente a pezzi i soggetti? Ricoprire una vittima sfortunata di miele e mangime e poi lasciare che una ventina di polli famelici facciano la loro magia, o forse quello strano marchingegno che {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} ha abbozzato chiamato "Dicitore e Malignatore di Prigionieri a Carrucola"? In ogni caso, vi viene in mente che potrebbe essere divertente farli costruire dai vostri ingegneri e metterli in mostra per tenere in riga i fastidiosi capi delle vostre famiglie vassalle. Sarebbe costoso, certo, ma potrebbe essere divertente, o almeno "divertente", e anche questo ha un valore. Cosa volete fare?

Entry.en-US: {CHARACTER-3} has been spending a lot of time at your Court in recent months and the two of you have struck up an easy friendship. {G3:He:She} has a seemingly unending supply of wild tales of far off places. One story in particular that keeps getting mentioned really piques your interest. It revolves around the discovery of gigantic beasts called Elephants that could be used for both peace or war. The more you hear of them, the more you realize you have to have some. The question, of course, is how. "Well, if it is something you're serious about, I do know the way. We'd have to travel quite a distance and such an expedition would be expensive, but it is possible..." Indeed. In truth, it is merely a question of resources...
Entry.it-IT: {CHARACTER-3} has been spending a lot of time at your Court in recent months and the two of you have struck up an easy friendship. {G3:He:She} has a seemingly unending supply of wild tales of far off places. One story in particular that keeps getting mentioned really piques your interest. It revolves around the discovery of gigantic beasts called Elephants that could be used for both peace or war. The more you hear of them, the more you realize you have to have some. The question, of course, is how. "Well, if it is something you're serious about, I do know the way. We'd have to travel quite a distance and such an expedition would be expensive, but it is possible..." Indeed. In truth, it is merely a question of resources...

Entry.en-US: You and {CHARACTER-3} couldn't be more different. The two of you are a study in contrasts and yet, you share one shining, important trait. You are both seen as heroes by your respective People. You both possess larger than life personalities, and it is this, more than anything, that has drawn you together. Entry.en-US: Though you and {CHARACTER-3} come from very different worlds, you do share similar tastes and interests that tend toward the exotic. It is in this spirit that {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} comes to you bearing an extraordinary offer. "In my recent travels, I chanced upon a land where they grew a remarkable delicacy. Called 'Olives,' they grow on trees in carefully cultivated groves. When I saw them, I couldn't resist the urge to bring some home. They cost me a fortune, but I think the expense was worth it. Then I recalled that you and I share similar tastes. If you're interested, I shall give you half of the saplings I brought home as a gesture of goodwill" What say you?

To be sure, there's still much to be done, but your People are prosperous and more often than not, thriving under your rule. The same can be said of {CHARACTER-3}, a like-minded individual who has led {G3:his:her} people out of darkness and into a better future as well. The question, then, is which of them might be worth pursuing in the here and now?

Entry.en-US: The world is a cold, dark, cruel place. Both your People and the {TRIBE-3}, however, seem to have been blessed. It is a phrase on everyone's lips. You and {CHARACTER-3} are different in a great many ways, but in what is perhaps the most important way, the two of you are the same. You both serve as shining beacons of hope and inspiration for your People. That two very different leaders have emerged at the same moment in history, both serving as lights to push back against the darkness, is a heartening sign indeed, and it speaks of great things to come. You and {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} have had many a late night conversation about the future of your two Realms, and on more than one occasion, the subject of building a monument of hope and prosperity has come up. It is a compelling idea, but also, it would be frightfully expensive. What do you wish to do, regarding this opportunity?

Entry.en-US: Few things are more satisfying than the thunder of hooves as your cavalry units bear down on your enemies, bringing swift and certain death. Of course, the opposite is also true. Few things are more terrifying than the sound of thunder just before an enemy cavalry formation crashes into your own ranks, then that half-heartbeat of silence before the screaming begins. It is a thing you and {CHARACTER-3} have discussed more than once. While you both love the idea of employing horse troops of your own, the notion that your enemies might use them against you doesn't sit well. "There must be something that can be done!" {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} said in disgust as {G3:he:she} banged {G3:his:her} tankard of ale down on the table during one of your many late night conversations. You find yourself very much in agreement, and as your conversation continues to unfold, a plan begins to emerge. It would be a frightfully expensive proposition, no doubt, but perhaps it would be possible to incorporate anti-mounted tactics into your training curriculum, and if that proved possible, then all your troops, or at least all the troops you trained in {CITY-4} would fare much better against those hated horse troops...

The level of organization of {G3:his:her} tax collectors goes far beyond anything you're currently doing and you sense an opportunity...

Entry.en-US: You and {CHARACTER-3} have been spending increasing amounts of time together. Since you have, one thing has become strikingly clear. The world works in mysterious ways. Some of the wise men and women in your Court insist that there are perfectly reasonably explanations for all the things you and your People do not understand, but you doubt that. So much that happens in the world seems to happen according to the whims of the gods and...what if you're not appeasing the right ones? It is a topic you and {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} have discussed more than once. Inspired by the most recent of those conversations, you think you've hit upon a way to cover all your bases and hopefully keep your Realm safe from the darker whims of the gods. What if you simply built a shrine to an Unknown God? That way, if some rogue god you're not appeasing sees it, maybe they'll pass your Kingdom by, sparing it from whatever ravages they may have otherwise thought to inflict. It seems like a worthwhile project to you and {CHARACTER-SHORT-3} heartily agrees. What say you?

"But first, let us offer you some refreshment. You must be tired after your long journey." They mistake your hospitality for fear as you weave them bit by bit into your web of honest charm. By the end of the afternoon, you have them eating out of the palm of your hand, and now that you've worked your special brand of magic, it's time to bring this unexpected visit to a satisfying conclusion. Having won the {TRIBE-2} over completely, what boon would you like to extract from them?

Entry.en-US: Another birthday and another year older. Sometimes, the weight of leadership presses heavily upon you, and you feel each and every one of those years. This year, however, {CHARACTER-2} appeared unexpectedly in your Court to celebrate with you. During the feasting and merriment {G2:he:she} leaned in close and whispered in your ear: "We may not always see eye to eye, but I know you to be an honorable {G0:man:woman}. That is a rare thing indeed in the world we live in, and I appreciate and admire it. As a token of my esteem, I shall offer you your choice of gifts from my Tribe. I offer you a tribute to your greatness, the wisdom of my Ministers, or training, courtesy of my finest warriors." What will you select?

Entry.en-US: Riders approach unexpectedly from the lands of the {TRIBE-2}. Their leader, {CHARACTER-SHORT-2} is breathless and flush with excitement. "Recent rains caused a mudslide that revealed a cave entrance in our territory. Some of my People ventured inside to explore it and found this..." {G2:He:She} hands you a bone scroll case, its seal still intact. "Given your inquisitive nature, my first thought was to bring it here to see if you could tell us what wisdom it might contain." You can barely conceal your excitement. How will you respond?

Entry.en-US: Your People, like all People, have traditions. Established ways of doing things. Unfortunately, "the way it's always been done" isn't always the best or most efficient. As you've continued to establish yourself in these new lands, you've been watching the way the {TRIBE-2} go about the business of harvesting food from the ground, from animals, and extracting metals from the earth. Their methods are somewhat different from yours, and frankly, better. It occured to you that if you could convince the tribal elders to allow your People to study their methods, you could create a series of hybrid techniques that gave you the best of both worlds and made all of your mines, farms and pastures more productive on the whole. It took some doing, but you've finally convinced {CHARACTER-2} to send some of {G2:his:her} people to your lands so you can learn from them. Paying for their upkeep will be a daunting expense but in the long run, the project could pay handsome dividends. What say you?

Entry.en-US: Your whole life, everyone has considered you to be weak. Everyone but {CHARACTER-2}. {G2:He:She} seems unaccountably fond of you, despite what everyone else says and despite the hard-edged reputation of the {TRIBE-2}. In recent months, {CHARACTER-SHORT-2} has been encouraging you to get out of your comfort zone, offering to accompany you on a number of...well, you'd call them terrifying adventures, where most people would call them typical days in the wildnerness. In any case, you're sorely tempted. Naturally, you'd want to outfit yourself with every tool imaginable in order to maximize your chances of returning home safely, but you understand why {CHARACTER-SHORT-2} is pushing you in this diretion, and deep down, you do appreciate it. The question is, can your Realm afford the added expense of your adventures?

Entry.en-US: Your days at Court are filled with hearing a wide range of petitions and deciding people's fates. Much of the time, the people who come before you and their various pleadings are fairly predictable. You do love it though, when you get a genuine surprise, and on this day, you have definitely recieved one. A {G3:man:woman} calling {G3:himself:herself} {CHARACTER-3} appears before you with a most intriguing proposition. "Majesty, I am primarily interested in trade. In bettering myself and improving the lot of my family by way of commerce. This stands in stark contrast to the general bent of my People, who would much rather fight and stuff their faces." You nod in understanding. "If I may come straight to the point, I find myself increasingly at odds with my own kind. Constant warfare is not the way forward. If you would agree to grant my tribe a sum of gold to formally release me, I would happily sever ties with my People and serve you." An intriguing notion indeed...

Entry.en-US: In recent years, your Kingdom has been plagued by small bands of raiders. While they're not a genuine threat to the security of your Kingdom, they're nettlesome and surprisingly effective, striking quickly and with precision before vanishing back into the wilderness like ghosts. They represent a constant drain on Kingdom resources you'd rather not face. Your scouts have just informed you that these 'Ghost Raiders,' apparently led by a fierce warrioress, are planning another attack. How do you want to respond?
